body:
A glitch i encountered... lost my full dia.


This happened when i was bow spamming enemy forces.

title: Hurr!?

replies.body: It's possible to shoot yourself now.
replies.body_tagged: It's possible to shoot yourself now.

replies.body:
Karma for bow spamming.

Nah if you think its a genuine bug post about it on the github (greater chance of it getting fixed there).
replies.body_tagged:
Karma for bow spamming.

Nah if you think its a genuine bug post about it on the github (greater chance of it getting fixed there).

replies.body: It's not a bug, you can shoot yourself now. Actually extremely helpful with rushing cuz if you have a punch bow and A) Want to get over without much of a bridge or B) A last minute decision when somebody is shooting at you or something
replies.body_tagged: It's not a bug, you can shoot yourself now. Actually extremely helpful with rushing cuz if you have a punch bow and A) Want to get over without much of a bridge or B) A last minute decision when somebody is shooting at you or something

replies.body: Just like what Arach said, please post bugs on Github.
